html:
• Deals

A deal on the Samsung T9 SSD lets you add terabytes of storage to your Mac or iPad without breaking the bank. The T9 offers up to 4TB of capacity and offers blazing fast data transfers, without the risks of cloud storage. And you can grab the SSD now at up to 33% below the original cost from a variety of retailers.

For an even more affordable option, the older Samsung T7 is available with considerable discounts, too.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

Samsung T9 SSD deal: Save on one of the best available

Portable, affordable SSD

Samsung T9 Portable SSD

4.5

The Samsung T9 solid-state drive is small enough and tough enough to go almost anywhere. Connect it to your Mac, iPad or even iPhone via its USB-C port to transfer data at up to 10Gb/s. Available in a range of capacities from 1TB to 4TB.

Pros:

  • Small and portable
  • Fast USB-C connectivity
  • Works with all your computers

I reviewed the Samsung T9 for Cult of Mac and was very pleased with it. It’s about the size of a credit card but thicker, which means it fits very easily in my gear bag.

But I can’t decide if that’s my favorite feature. Because I also really like that the Samsung SSD is compatible with so many different devices. The drive includes a USB-C port so of course it works with my iPad Pro, but I can also use it with pretty much any device with a USB-A port. It even comes bundled with the necessary cables for both types of ports.

When I was writing the review, I successfully tested the Samsung T9 drive with a variety of computers. That includes the iPhone 16 and iPhone 15 now that they include a standard USB-C port. Or I can plug it into my TV and play video. Those who still have an iPhone with a Lightning port can connect through an adapter.

And it’s fast. I can move a 1 GB file from my computer to the drive and vice versa in 2 seconds.

Plus, Samsung added a rubber coating to the exterior so the drive can survive drops up to 9.8 feet (3 meters).

All of this makes the T9 an ideal place to store a collection of music, videos, images, ebooks, etc. that you’d like to access on the go and/or with a range of computers.

And think about this: if you having an aging Mac with a too-tiny HD, you can get this SSD and bulk up your storage capacity. And when you get a replacement Mac you’ll still be able to use the accessory for storage.

Just about all of this is also true for the older Samsung T7 series except that it lacks the protective outer coating.  I reviewed it too.

Terabyte Samsung T9 SSD on sale

The largest the Samsung T9 gets is 4TB, and that version originally sold for $549.99, but even the regular price dropped since then. And with the current deal from multiple retailers, the cost is down to $299.99.

Buy 4TB T9 from: Amazon | Best Buy | Samsung

Don’t need quite so much storage? The 2TB version was originally $299.99 but you can grab it for only $199.99 from any of three retailers. That’s 33% off.

Buy 2TB T9 from: Amazon | Best Buy | Samsung

And there’s a deal on the 1TB version of the Samsung T9 SSD as well. It originally would set you back $174.99, but an Amazon sale lowers the cost to $97.58. Its rivals can’t match that price — they both charge $129.99

Buy 1TB T9 from: Amazon | Best Buy | Samsung

Portable, affordable SSD

Samsung T9 Portable SSD

4.5

The Samsung T9 solid-state drive is small enough and tough enough to go almost anywhere. Connect it to your Mac, iPad or even iPhone via its USB-C port to transfer data at up to 10Gb/s. Available in a range of capacities from 1TB to 4TB.

Pros:

  • Small and portable
  • Fast USB-C connectivity
  • Works with all your computers

And don’t for get the Samsung T7

The 4TB version of the Samsung T7 SSD originally sold for $479.99, and the regular price dropped since then. but this deal pushed the cost down to $249.99. That’s a quite drop, and there are two options to choose from because Best Buy can’t match that deal.

Buy 4TB T7 from: Amazon | Best Buy | Samsung

The 2TB version originally sold for $269.99 but special deals from three retailers lower it to $139.99. That’s $130 down.

Buy 2TB T7 from: Amazon | Best Buy | Samsung

Plus, the 1TB version is regularly $159.99 but is now available from Amazon at $97.58. You must choose the gray colorway the get the deal, though. Samsung offers the same SSD variant at $99.99 and Best Buy at $109.99.

Buy 1TB T7 from: Amazon | Best Buy | Samsung

Portable, affordable storage

Samsung T7 Portable SSD

4.5

The Samsung T7 isn’t much bigger than a credit card but still holds terabytes of data.

Pros:

  • Much cheaper than built-in storage
  • USB-C port allows it to be used with desktops, laptops, tablets, phones and more

Cons:

  • Not rugged
  • Not Thunderbolt

The rival Kingston XS1000 is ann option fo anyone who’d prefer to stay away from Samsung. The 2TB version is $140.15.
